channel.title: My Server is online but wen i try to add says offline?
channel.description: it says offline wen i run server and then try to add and i have run a server b4.

item.title: My Server is online but wen i try to add says offline?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

go to run cmd then ipconfig type ur default gateway in ur adress thing on e-net and go to gaming tab and type 43594 to 43594 and make shure it also is in ur fre wall by goin to control panel then windows fire wall then go to exception tab and press add port and type 43594 and make shure tht its udp and also download no-ip and tick it

Read full topic
item.source: My Server is online but wen i try to add says offline?

item.title: My Server is online but wen i try to add says offline?
item.dc:creator: @newservermaker newservermaker
item.description:
@newservermaker wrote:

Do the followiong:

  1. Make sure Port 43594-55555 are open for players to connect to (jsut a suggestion, uou can do 43594 if you want)
  2. Make sure you have no-ip on.
  3. If # 2 doesnt work, i suggest useing a static IP
  4. Make sure the server is on and runing
  5. If still doesnt work, PM me and ill get back to you as soon as i can

Read full topic
